lang.dontShowMeThisMessageAgain: Don't show me this message again
lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

products.name: Mobil SHC Pegasus™
products.information: Synthetic natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Advanced technology helps increase fuel efficiency, lower fuel costs and reduces emissions compared to ExxonMobil's standard SAE 40 natural gas engine oils; keep clean performance and wear protection help extend component life

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 1
products.information: Synthetic natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Proprietary formulation helps to minimize ash deposits, piston land deposits, liner scuffing, and valve seat and valve face wear; will  ﬂow at -40 ºC (40⁰ F), ensuring good cold start-up properties and effective lubrication at cold temperatures

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 1005
products.information: Premium natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Improved oil life compared to Mobil Pegasus 905; fewer oil changes helps enable lower operating costs and higher productivity; helps reduces deposits in combustion chamber and pistons to maximize engine efficiency and reliability; helps reduces deposits in heat exchangers to maximize heat production; minimizes deposits to help extend catalytic converter life; helps maximize engine reliability and performance.

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 805
products.information: Premium natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Exceptional oxidation and nitration resistance for cleaner engines and longer oil and filter service; outstanding anti-wear and anti-scuff protection for reduced scoring, scuffing and wear of pistons and liners

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 801
products.information: Premium performance gas engine oil intended for the lubrication of gas engines operating at low, medium and high speeds where ashless and low-ash oils are recommended
products.benefits: Outstanding performance in  two- and four-cycle gas engines where ashless and low-ash oils are recommended; protects high BMEP engines against scuffing, scoring and wear particularly during critical break-in periods; long engine life and potential for low maintenance costs.

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 800
products.information: Synthetic turbine oil for stationary gas turbines and boost compressors (Natural Gas Compression Station Only)
products.benefits: Excellent low-temperature and viscosity/temperature properties; excellent oxidation stability; outstanding protection against wear

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oils
products.benefits: Helps improve equipment productivity due to potential for reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; helps extend oil life; by reducing friction, helps improve energy efficiency compared with mineral oils.

products.name: Mobil DTE 10 Excel™
products.information: Premium performance anti-wear hydraulic oils for wide temperature range applications
products.benefits: Helps keep hydraulic sysytems clean by preventing valve sticking; controls contamination and provides wear protection to help improve equipment reliability and life compared to ExxonMobil's standard hydraulic fluids, which can reduce both maintenance costs and product disposal costs; shear stability-enbling oil to maintain system efficiency and equipment protection at both high and low temperatures.

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 805
products.information: Premium natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Exceptional oxidation and nitration resistance for cleaner engines and longer oil and filter service; outstanding anti-wear and anti-scuff protection for reduced scoring, scuffing and wear of pistons and liners

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 801
products.information: Premium performance gas engine oil intended for the lubrication of gas engines operating at low, medium and high speeds where ashless and low-ash oils are recommended
products.benefits: Outstanding performance in  two- and four-cycle gas engines where ashless and low-ash oils are recommended; protects high BMEP engines against scuffing, scoring and wear particularly during critical break-in periods; long engine life and potential for low maintenance costs.

products.name: Mobil DTE 10 Excel™
products.information: Premium performance anti-wear hydraulic oils for wide temperature range applications
products.benefits: Helps keep hydraulic sysytems clean by preventing valve sticking; controls contamination and provides wear protection to help improve equipment reliability and life compared to ExxonMobil's standard hydraulic fluids, which can reduce both maintenance costs and product disposal costs; shear stability-enbling oil to maintain system efficiency and equipment protection at both high and low temperatures.

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 205
products.information: Compounded compressor cylinder oil
products.benefits: Excellent resistance to washing by water and other entrained liquids; effective lubrication at low feed rates; helps to extend ring and packing life properties.

products.name: Mobil DTE™ Oil Named
products.information: Premium rust and oxidation inhibited circulating oils
products.benefits: Good corrosion resistance and water tolerance for a wide range of compressor cylinder applications

products.name: Mobil Glygoyle™
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and compressor oil ( Natural Gas Compression Station and Gathering Site Compression only)
products.benefits: Designed to provide long oil life and equipment protection; low traction coefficient helps maximize energy efficiency.

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 800
products.information: Synthetic turbine oil for stationary gas turbines and boost compressors (Natural Gas Compression Station Only)
products.benefits: Excellent low-temperature and viscosity/temperature properties; excellent oxidation stability; outstanding protection against wear

components.name: Gathering Site Compression - Air Heat Exchanger

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: Synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; excellent thermal stability and oxidation resistance; helps maximize re-greasing interval when compared to conventional oils, which can potentially reduce service costs

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: Synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; excellent thermal stability and oxidation resistance; helps maximize re-greasing interval when compared to conventional oils, which can potentially reduce service costs

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 1005
products.information: Premium natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Improved oil life compared to Mobil Pegasus 905; fewer oil changes helps enable lower operating costs and higher productivity; helps reduces deposits in combustion chamber and pistons to maximize engine efficiency and reliability; helps reduces deposits in heat exchangers to maximize heat production; minimizes deposits to help extend catalytic converter life; helps maximize engine reliability and performance.

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: Synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; excellent thermal stability and oxidation resistance; helps maximize re-greasing interval when compared to conventional oils, which can potentially reduce service costs

products.name: Mobil DTE 10 Excel™, Mobil DTE™ 20
products.information: Premium performance anti-wear hydraulic oils engineered for wide temperature range applications
products.benefits: Helps keep hydraulic systems clean, which prevents valve sticking; helps control contamination and provides wear protection to improve equipment reliability and life; can help reduce both maintenance costs and product disposal costs; shear stability enabling oil to help maintain system efficiency and equipment protection at both high and low temperatures

components.name: Gathering Site Compression - Starting Air Compressors

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 1020
products.information: Synthetic compressor oil for rotary screw air compressors
products.benefits: Exceptional cleanliness and stability characteristics help to extend service life of equipment; reduce deposits; provide long oil life; lower maintenance costs; reduce wear of components compared to mineral lubricants
